EmailTemplate.subject: Message from Head of Secondary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Message from the Head of Secondary
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
As I am out of school for much of Friday I will write my newsletter to you over the weekend to be published on Monday.
I hope you have a restful weekend.
Kind Regards, Derek Mackey Head of Secondary The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
